Genevariation3d workshop ISB 2017

February 9th, 10th, 2017

About Genevariation3d workshop

Workshop

A two-day workshop at the Institute for Systems Biology in Seattle, Washington, for collaborators and other researchers working toward the interconnection of precision medicine, genomic, proteomic, and protein structure data.

20+
attendees

from everywhere

2+
days

of Big Data technologies
